messages.messageBody:
On 16 Dec 02, at 10:03, Earthmomma67@... wrote:

> In a message dated 12/16/02 9:47:18 AM Eastern Standard Time,
> shyrley.williams@... writes:
>
> > Yeah but Ren, she's hard enough to get to visit. I been asking her
> > for months ;-)
> >
> > Shyrley
> >
> >
> >
>
> And I only live about 15 miles away!
> Elissa, who WILL get there, but not until your MIL has left.
>

She's not coming till February. I think.
Plenty of time to fit in a vist or two plus the Unschooling thingy I
will host in January. When I've thought of a date.
Actually I could do the Feb meeting during her visit ;-)

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."
